desc: Visual Brainstorm is made in C++ using the Qt Framework.  I've been studying programming for some time now. Visual Brainstorm is a display of my understanding of Object-Oriented programming and my will to build.
Quiz Template provides the groundwork for a more complex testing system. It utilizes a custom random number generator to sort possible the wrong and correct answers in a multiple-choice test.
This project is a template file for building more complex Front End web work in HTML, CSS, and Javascript. It comes in the form of a portfolio and is a good starting point for other web pages.
A React project that queries the Random Employee API, when this information is returned it can be sorted by clicking the name header field.
Weather Dashboard is a Node and Handlebars project that queries the Open Weather API to return a Five-day forecast and current weather for any city in the world.

In a collaboration project, I wrote the Javascript for much of the front-end and backend code on this project. It's a Magic the Gathering Social Media website that allows you to post Magic the Gathering Cards in a social media setting. This project made use Sequelize, on the Node backend and jQuery and handlebars on the front end.
